repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: UTU Additional Records

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UTU Additional Records #6023. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives 227 Ives Hall Tower Road Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheelref@cornell.edu https://catherwood.library.cornell.edu/kheel/

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /3012: Alice Cook Papers /4014: ILR School Dean's Office Additional Files /4040: George H. Hildebrand Papers /4055: James O. Morris Office Files /4064: Kurt Hanslowe Papers /4073: James O. Morris Office Files /4139: Martin P. Catherwood Library Librarian's Office Additional Files /4148: George W. Brooks Additional Papers /4164: Harrison M. Trice Additional Papers /4212: Kheel Center Current Documents Correspondence 5007: U.S. Emergency Board No. 175 Transcripts and Exhibits 5027: U.S. Emergency Board No. 178 Transcripts 5034: Switchmen's Union of North America Records 5034 MB: Switchmen's Union of North America Memorabilia 5034 P: Switchmen's Union of North America Photographs 5084: Switchmen's Union of North America Additional Records 5139: UTU Records 5139 AV: UTU Audio-Visual Material 5139 MB: UTU Memorabilia 5139 P: UTU Photographs 5141: Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen Records 5141 G: Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen Graphics 5141 MB: Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen Memorabilia 5141 P: Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen Photographs 5148: Order of Railway Conductors and Brakemen Records 5148 MB: Order of Railway Conductors and Brakemen Memorabilia 5148 P: Order of Railway Conductors and Brakemen Photographs 5164: UTU Canada Records 5173: John Collins Collection of Railway Labor Records 5183: Edward Heisler Collection of Southern Pacific Railroad Operating Crafts Union Organizing Documents 5189: Labor Song Books 5194: Jacob Seidenberg Additional Files 5196: UTU Ladies' Auxiliary Iowa Joint Board Minutes 5197: Illinois Central Gulf Railroad Miscellany 5197 MB: Illinois Central Gulf Railroad Memorabilia 5203: Grace McDonald Papers 5203: Grace McDonald Papers
